list_page_teaser: Steve & Sue have been going together for decades.  Click to learn more!
description_html:
Steve and Sue are parents and have been together for many years.

Hopefully they will share some of their tips for how they make their relationship last. Check back soon for updates!
story_html:
I met Steve and Sue long ago when I lived in Richmond, Virginia. Our mutual friend Jim Armstrong was in many respects the center of our group of friends.

Since then I have relocated to Denver and we have been out of touch. I wanted to have something for them to look at before asking them to share their story.

I will share more information as it becomes available. To learn when I update the site, follow us on social media or join the email list!

image_list.title: Steve P.
image_list.subtitle_html: Retired Driver for UPS
image_list.gallery_page_teaser: The Green and Yellow in Steve's spiritual portrait says he is logical and down-to-earth.  Click on the image to learn more!
image_list.explain_dom: The Green in this portrait represents Steve's dominant trait, his rationality.  In Introverts, the dominant trait is directed inwardly, and spiritual portraits use a long horizontal line to represent this.
image_list.explain_aux: The Yellow in this portrait represents Steve's auxiliary trait, his pragmatism.  In Introverts, the auxiliary trait is directed outwardly and is more evident than the dominant trait.
image_list.story_intro_html: Steve and Sue live in Richmond, Virginia. Steve went to school at ....
image_list.story_html:
Steve and Sue live in Richmond, Virginia. Steve went to school at Virginia Commonwealth University and is a retired driver for United Parcel Service.

I will share more information as it becomes available.

image_list.title: Sue
image_list.subtitle_html: Retired Teacher
image_list.gallery_page_teaser: The Blue and Red in Sue's spiritual portrait says she is idealistic and passionate.  Click on the image to learn more!
image_list.explain_dom: The Blue in this portrait represents Sue's dominant trait, her idealism.  In Extraverts, the dominant trait is directed outwardly, and spiritual portraits use a long vertical line to represent this, because it is the side of their personality that is most evident.
image_list.explain_aux: The Red in this portrait represents Sue's auxiliary trait, her passion.  In Extraverts, the auxiliary trait is directed inwardly and is less evident than the dominant trait.
image_list.story_intro_html: Sue and Steve live in Richmond, Virginia. Sue studied teaching and ....
image_list.story_html:
Sue and Steve live in Richmond, Virginia. Sue studied teaching and archeology at Virginia Commonwealth University and is a retired teacher.

I will share more information as it becomes available.
